div.p:
St. Paul City Primary School • St. Paul City Middle School
River’s Edge Academy High School

div.h1: St. Paul City Schools is a public PreK-12 charter school district located in the heart of St. Paul, MN. Our three schools serve nearly 600 students in an empowering community where they thrive academically and socially.
